title: Poro Stuff Are Out!!!
body:
Guys if you are reading this STOP the amazing Poro stuff are out!
Go buy them, All of em
Gotta Collect them All!
 If your still reading what are the stuff your getting?
I am getting ALL!!!
Cya{{summoner:31}}
From {{summoner:30}}

replies.body: not getting anything, why would i buy from a company that reuses an icon.

what do you mean reuses 
do you mean last years icons?

> [{quoted}](name=XxNoobxMasterxX,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=cr15GvYA,comment-id=00040000,timestamp=2014-12-16T22:33:55.330+0000)
>
> what do you mean reuses 
> do you mean last years icons?

they're reusing the slay bell icon, but it's worse.
is funny cause your using the battlecast icon
Yes baby!! riot why not put battlecast poro icon on icon?! it is only for the bundle?!

i bought all the wards and icon bundle 
ftw
yeh i am so sad where did they go the battlecast and stuff

ALSO THE NEW GAME MODE AND SKINS

Thanks Riot
